name: Papira Roboto
description:
A-Mazing puzzle where every level is similar, but the walkthrough is not.

Papira Roboto — a cute little robot made of paper — crashed in a mysterious cave, where every grotto is as like as two drops of water...

Help the robot get out of this cursed place by navigating 40 (more to come!) Interesting puzzle levels. Each level, although similar to the previous one, is traversed in its own way.

How far will you go?

The game is in early access (it's hard to call it even a soft release), so it's very poorly polished and unbalanced. I will be glad to criticism, suggestions and ideas!
